subject: [Mhln] we guarantee once a day Deborah
body:
You can tell more about a person by what he says about others than you can by what others say about him.

Luck marches with those who give their very best

We have no commission from God to police the world.

Believe you are defeated, believe it long enough, and it is likely to become a fact.

People sitting on top of the world, usually arrived there standing up.

The greatest mistake a man can make is to be afraid of making one.

The tendency to whining and complaining may be taken as the surest sign symptom of little souls and inferior intellects.

Nature makes woman to be won and men to win.

I wouldn't recommend sex, drugs or insanity for everyone, but they've always worked for me.

It is more fitting for a man to laugh at life than to lament over it.


Mysteries are due to secrecy.

I love those who do not know how to live for today.

Nothing is more powerful than custom or habit.
